question: Choose the right answer . Kies het juiste antwoord . Choisissez la bonne reponse . About MyBook Founded in March 2005 , MyBook is a social utility that helps people communicate more efficiently with their friends , family and colleagues . The company develops technologies that facilitate the sharing of information through the social graph , the digital mapping of people 's real-world social connections . Anyone can sign up for MyBook and interact with the people they know in a trusted environment . Which of these statements is correct ?
answer: MyBook is a business 
Incorrect answers: 
1. MyBook is a training center 
2. MyBook is an international organization 
3. MyBook is a non-profit organization

question: Choose the opposite of the word in bold . This company is loss-making .
answer: profit-making

question: Read the text and answer the questions . Hi , my name is Emily and I want to tell you about my family . My parents , my sister and I live in a small town in Cumbria , in the Northwest of England . My father works in a garage and my mother works in a school as a teacher . I 'm 14 years old and my sister is 13 years old . We go to the same school together with our two cousins Fred and Carol . They 're my aunt 's children . Fred is 13 years old and Carol is the same age as me . The four of us always visit our grandparents after school on Thursdays . They always give us some sweets or biscuits and then they tell us funny stories about our parents . We love them so much . I also have a nephew who is 2 years old . He is the son of my elder brother who moved to London several years ago with his girlfriend and their son . I do n't see my nephew that often , only once or twice a year . Well , I have to go now . Take care ! How old is Carol ?
answer: Carol is 14 years old 
Incorrect answers: 
1. Carol is 2 years old 
2. Carol is 13 years old
